titles.title: Recognizing and supporting the goals and ideals of "National Runaway Prevention Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization.
Mr. Duncan moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 57.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/26/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on February 5, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Recognizes and supports the goals and ideals of National Runaway Prevention Month.
